SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description1Txt: SCHOLARSHIPS PROGRAM - AIMS TO PROVIDE SCHOLARSHIPS TO QUALIFIED TALENTED YOUTH IN ORDER FOR THEM TO PURSUDEUNDERGRADUATE AND GRADUATE STUDIES IN PUERTO RICO AND ABROAD.
SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description2Txt: BRIGHT STARS PROGRAM- AIMS TO PROVIDE JUNIOR HIGH AND HIGH SCHOOL STUDENT'S ASSISTANCE AND COUNSELING TO PREPARE SUCH STUDENTS FOR A SUCCESSFUL COLLEGE CARRER. EXPAND OPPORTUNITY TO PUERTO RICO'S STUDENTS BY INSPIRING THE STUDENTS TO TAKE CHARGE OF THEIR FUTURE COLLEGE CAREERS BY PROVIDING ACCESS TO KEY PEOPLE AND RESOURCES, INCLUDING COLLEGE ADMITTANCE TEST. (I.E. SAT) AND OTHER GRADUATE SCHOOL ADMISSION TEST.

ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.FormAndInfoAndMaterialsTxt: APPLICATIONS CAN BE FILED THROUGH THE KINESIS, INC., WEB PAGE. AMONG DOCUMENTS TO BE SUBMITTED ARE ADMISSION LETTER, EVIDENCE OF FINACIAL NEED, AND TRANSCRIPT.
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.RestrictionsOnAwardsTxt: GRADE AVERAGE POINT SHOULD BE 3. 5 OR HIGHER AND SHOULD BE ADMITTED ONE OF THE 100 TOP UNIVERSITIES.

GrantOrContributionPdDurYrGrp.RecipientPersonNm: FROM KINESIS INC TO KINESIS IT ACAD

THAT ALLOW THE FOUNDATION TO MEET ITS GRANTS REQUIREMENTS
